review_details: Me and my daughter spent an amazing day with the professional, serviceminded and lovely captains Giannis, Nansy and Areti from Samos Fishing Trips. An absolutely perfect day and extraordinary experience we will never forget! Dolphins, fishing, swimming and sharing a delicious meal with fantastic people Highly recommended!
